name: quick-powder
effect: Held by Ditto: Doubles the holder's initial Speed.
short_effect: Doubles Ditto's Speed when held. The boost is lost after transforming.

flavor_text_entries.diamond-pearl:
An item to be held by DITTO.
Extremely fine yet hard, this odd
powder boosts the Speed stat.
